Lea Michele had ` ` two minutes'' to think about what she needed to take with her as she evacuated her house Wednesday morning amid the wildfires ravaging Southern California. ` ` I had two minutes to think of what I can take and I grabbed my cat and that's all,'' she told The Hollywood Reporter at its annual Women in Entertainment breakfast. ` ` It really doesn't matter, all you need is to surround yourself with the people that you love.
